ResearchProjectDef.label: 15cm sIG 33
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses the 150mm I Gr 33 Shell with 4m explosive radius. 15m min range, 150m max range. Has a reload rate of 30 seconds. Able to shoot over walls. Explodes with radius of 2 blocks when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 9.7 Inch Howitzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses the 9.2 Inch (288mm) Mk.I HE shell with 7m explosive radius. 20m min range, 250m max range. Has a reload rate of 50 seconds. Able to shoot over walls. Explodes with radius of 2 blocks when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 122mm 2S1 Gvozdika
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses the 122mm OF-462 Shell with 2m explosion radius. 20m Min range, 150m Max range. 15 Seconds reload. Has an internal ammo storage capacity of 40 rounds. Explodes with radius of 2 blocks when destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 152mm 2S3 Akatsiya
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses the 152mm OF-540 Shell with 4m explosion radius. 20m Min range, 180m Max range. 15 Seconds reload. Has an internal ammo storage capacity of 46 rounds. Explodes with radius of 2 blocks when destroyed. With this turret you can build a wall between the colonist and the turret to protect the colonist.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 152mm 2S19 Msta
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses the 152mm OF-540 Shell with 4m explosion radius. 20m Min range, 220m Max range. 9 Seconds reload. Has an internal ammo storage capacity of 50 rounds. Explodes with radius of 2 blocks when destroyed. Consumes 500W of power. With this turret you can build a wall between the colonist and the turret to protect the colonist.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 155mm GCT AUF1
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uses the 155mm M795 Shell with 5m explosion radius. 20m Min range, 300m Max range. Fires a burst of 3 rounds at 12 rounds per minute fire rate, then cools down for 9 seconds. Has an internal ammo storage capacity of 42 rounds. Explodes with radius of 2 blocks when destroyed. Consumes 1000W of power. With this turret you can build a wall between the colonist and the turret to protect the colonist.
